name: Dessert Maker - Slushy Milkshake Treats
description:
“Exciting gameplay”
“Beautiful Graphics”
“Awesome music”
___________________________________

Have tons of fun and get super creative with Dessert Maker! Dessert Maker is an amazing iPad game where you will make yummy and sweet desserts. Get random flavours, mix, bake decorate and eat. Step into your kitchen and create delicious desserts. Enjoy!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Exciting gameplay
Beautiful physics
Original sound and music
